compatibility.notes: The GPL-2.0-only license requires that any derivative works or combined works be licensed under the same license. This strong copyleft effect means that it is generally incompatible with permissive licenses.

key_requirements: Must provide the same freedoms to recipients as received.
Must not impose additional restrictions on the rights granted by the license.
Must ensure that any distributed modified versions are also licensed under GPL-2.0-only.
license.name: GPL-2.0-only
obligations: Distribute copies of the software with the same license.
Provide source code or access to it when distributing the software.
Include a copy of the GPL license with any distributed software.
State any changes made to the original software.
